text: Bret Michael Sychak, better known as Bret Michaels (born March 15, 1963 in Butler, Pennsylvania), is the lead singer of the glam metal band Poison. He also starred on VH1's reality television program Rock of Love 2. He is also a contestant on Celebrity Apprentice. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Official Poison website Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:American movie actors Category:Singers from Pennsylvania Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:American rock musicians Category:American heavy metal singers
title: Bret Michaels
